mapper.select: WITH CDT AS( SELECT CDT_ITEM , CASE WHEN CDT_FROMDATE > #{return_date} THEN 'rentable' WHEN CDT_TODATE < #{rent_date} THEN 'rentable' ELSE 'rented' END AS CDT_CONDITION FROM ( SELECT CDT_ITEM , CDT_FROMDATE , CDT_TODATE , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CDT_ITEM ORDER BY CDT_CREATEDATE DESC) AS ROW_IDX FROM TB_CONDITION ORDER BY CDT_CREATEDATE DESC ) WHERE ROW_IDX = 1 ), ITEM AS ( SELECT ITM_ID , ITM_NAME FROM TB_ITEM ) SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ITEM.ITM_ID , ITEM.ITM_NAME , CDT.CDT_CONDITION , ROWNUM AS RN FROM ITEM LEFT JOIN CDT ON ITEM.ITM_ID = CDT.CDT_ITEM WHERE ITM_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start_idx} AND #{end_idx}

SELECT USR_ID , USR_NAME FROM TB_USER WHERE USR_ID != 'ADMIN' AND USR_ACTIVE = 'Y'

SELECT CDT_ITEM , CDT_CONDITION FROM ( SELECT CDT_ITEM , CASE WHEN CDT_FROMDATE > #{returnDate} THEN 'rentable' WHEN CDT_TODATE < #{rentDate} THEN 'rentable' ELSE 'rented' END AS CDT_CONDITION FROM ( SELECT CDT_ITEM , CDT_CONDITION , CDT_FROMDATE , CDT_TODATE , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CDT_ITEM ORDER BY CDT_CREATEDATE DESC) AS ROW_IDX FROM TB_CONDITION ORDER BY CDT_CREATEDATE DESC ) WHERE ROW_IDX = 1 )

SELECT ITM_NAME , CDT_CONDITION , CDT_ITEM , CDT_USER , CDT_FROMDATE , CDT_TODATE FROM ( SELECT ITEM.ITM_NAME , CDT.CDT_CONDITION , CDT.CDT_ITEM , CDT.CDT_USER , TO_CHAR(CDT.CDT_FROMDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS CDT_FROMDATE , TO_CHAR(CDT.CDT_TODATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS CDT_TODATE , ROWNUM AS RN FROM TB_CONDITION CDT , TB_ITEM ITEM WHERE CDT.CDT_ITEM = ITEM.ITM_ID AND CDT.CDT_USER = #{user} AND CDT.CDT_FROMDATE >= #{search_date} AND ITEM.ITM_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{start_idx} AND #{end_idx}

SELECT ITM.ITM_ID , ITM.ITM_NAME , CDT.CDT_USER , CDT.CDT_RETURN , CDT.CDT_NOTE , TO_CHAR(CDT.CDT_FROMDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS CDT_FROMDATE , TO_CHAR(CDT.CDT_TODATE ,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS CDT_TODATE , CDT.CDT_CREATEDATE FROM TB_ITEM ITM , ( SELECT CDT_ITEM , CDT_USER , CDT_RETURN , CDT_NOTE , CDT_FROMDATE , CDT_TODATE , CDT_CREATEDATE FROM ( SELECT CDT_ITEM , CDT_USER , CDT_RETURN , CDT_NOTE , CDT_FROMDATE , CDT_TODATE , CDT_CREATEDATE , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY CDT_ITEM ORDER BY CDT_CREATEDATE DESC) AS ROW_IDX FROM TB_CONDITION WHERE CDT_LOCATION = #{user_id} AND CDT_CONDITION = 'rent_requested' ORDER BY CDT_CREATEDATE DESC ) WHERE ROW_IDX = 1 ) CDT WHERE CDT.CDT_ITEM = ITM.ITM_ID
